meanings.definition: A person who plays the cembalo.
meanings.sent1: The talented cembalists performed a beautiful melody on the cembalo.
meanings.sent2: The cembalists at the concert played with skill and passion.
meanings.sent3: The cembalists decided to have a musical duel on the cembalo.
meanings.sent4: In the orchestra of life, the cembalists provide the delicate harmony.
meanings.sent5: The cembalists' fingers danced gracefully on the cembalo keys.

meanings.sent1: We invited the cembalists to perform at the event.
meanings.sent2: The group of cembalists played together in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent3: The cembalists' gathering turned into a lively musical party.
meanings.sent4: The cembalists' music echoed through the halls, enchanting all who listened.
meanings.sent5: The cembalists' ensemble captivated the audience with their skillful performance.
